Posts.Content: Hi! I was diagnosed with breast cancer in January and I have had chemo, surgery and radiotherapy. I have been signed off work since February. Does anyone have experience and would like to share their thoughts on when to go back to work again. I’m at the moment not sure when I will go back, because how do I know when I’m ready ? My work is quite physical demanding. I will go back part time to start with once I go back. Many thanks!
Posts.Title: Going back to work after breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thanks! I guess you are right. Time will tell when I’m ready to get back. X
Posts.Title: Going back to work after breast cancer
